member.name: T:Kindergarden_Models.Group
member.summary: Represents a group entity with a unique identifier, required name, and collection of associated kids.

member.name: P:Kindergarden_Models.Group.GroupId
member.summary: Gets or sets the group identifier.

member.name: P:Kindergarden_Models.Group.GroupName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the group.

member.name: T:Kindergarden_Models.Kid
member.summary: Represents a child entity with a unique identifier, required first name, last name, and optional age, associated parent, and group.

member.name: P:Kindergarden_Models.Kid.KidId
member.summary: Gets or sets the kid identifier.

member.name: P:Kindergarden_Models.Kid.FirstName
member.summary: Gets or sets the first name.

member.name: P:Kindergarden_Models.Kid.LastName
member.summary: Gets or sets the last name.

member.name: P:Kindergarden_Models.Kid.ParentId
member.summary: Gets or sets the parent identifier.

member.name: T:Kindergarden_Models.Parent
member.summary: Represents a parent entity with a unique identifier, first name, last name, phone number, address, and collection of associated kids.

member.name: P:Kindergarden_Models.Parent.ParentId
member.summary: Gets or sets the parent identifier.

member.name: P:Kindergarden_Models.Parent.FirstName
member.summary: Gets or sets the first name.

member.name: P:Kindergarden_Models.Parent.LastName
member.summary: Gets or sets the last name.

member.name: P:Kindergarden_Models.Parent.PhoneNumber
member.summary: Gets or sets the phone number.

member.name: P:Kindergarden_Models.Parent.Kids
member.summary: Gets or sets the kids of one parent.
